item.title: FT Most Read: Monday, October 14, 2024 at 7:10 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Trio of economists wins Nobel Prize for work on wealth of nations
2. Starmer vows to rip up bureaucracy to unleash ‘shock and awe’ of investment
3. $10mn? $30mn? $100mn? The redefinition of the super-rich
4. Barry Diller: ‘I want Donald Trump pushed into the dustheap of history’
5. ‘King of the geeks’: how Alex Gerko built a British trading titan
item.guid: FT Most Read: Monday, October 14, 2024 at 7:10 PM UTC
